text: Tumacyasathi he bandhanakaraka kele gele ahe ki jevha tumacyapaiki ekhadyace marana javala ye'una thepela ani to apalya mage dhana-sampatti soduna jata asela tara tyane apalya mata-pityasathi ani nateva'ikansathi bhalepanane vasiyata (mrtyupatra) karuna jave. Allahace bhaya rakhanaryanvara he anivarya kartavya ahe
